00061     class _OgreExport Overlay

00065               typedef std::list<OverlayContainer*> OverlayContainerList;
00066     protected:
00067         String mName;
00069         SceneNode* mRootNode;
00070         // 2D elements
00071         // OverlayContainers, linked list for easy sorting by zorder later
00072         // Not a map because sort can be saved since changes infrequent (unlike render queue)
00073         OverlayContainerList m2DElements;
00074 
00075         // Degrees of rotation around center
00076         Radian mRotate;
